sentences.sentence: Reigning champion Max Verstappen produced a superb performance to claim victory at the United States Grand Prix in Austin on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This was the Dutch driver's 50th career victory and his third consecutive triumph on this particular track.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Verstappen proved too strong for Lewis Hamilton, who had to settle for second place but was later disqualified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Lando Norris finished third, completing the podium.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This outstanding victory adds another chapter to Verstappen's already illustrious career, and sees him equal his own record of 15 victories in a single season.
